ygData.subject: RE: New NPC in Highpass? (off-topic & possible spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: I found the same thing in Paw a couple of weeks ago.  There was a dark elf necromancer named Nixx Nenix roaming Paw.  I was just coming out after successfully
ygData.messageBody:
I found the same thing in Paw a couple of weeks ago. There was a dark elf
necromancer named Nixx Nenix roaming Paw. I was just coming out after
successfully defeating Shaman Ren Rex and saw a dark elf swimming. I
figured it was another player until he tagged with a damage over time (DOT).
I made it to the zone before he could catch me and zoned out and the DOT
still took me down 3 and 1/2 bubbles of health (I had 571 hit points at
level 19).

Cwelenas, Minstrel of the 8th Chord
Angarth Bladedancer, Warrior of the 21st Tier
"Periissem ni periisem"


> ----------
> From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL
> G4[SMTP:g4mntofcr@...]
> Reply To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Sent: Friday, July 23, 1999 3:35 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] New NPC in Highpass? (off-topic & possible
> spoiler)
>
> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> Apologize beforehand for adding to the increasing number of off topic
> posts
> on this list but I had an encounter last night with a NPC in Highpass hold
> that I had never seen or heard of before. I was camping the Mucktail site
> with a level 29 cleric. While we were waiting, we start to see messages
> scroll through "Cytodl Krish begins to cast a spell". Next thing we know
> we
> get attacked by a high level DE necro. He conned red to me (19 bard) and
> blue to the 29 cleric. Because we were totally caught by surprise, we
> both
> had to make a run for the Keep zone. We fully recharged and went out
> looking for him. I was singing invis and had elemental and purifying
> ryhthms ready to weave. We finally found the necro wandering around the
> zone, with a bunch of corpses in his wake. We attacked at the cleric
> tried
> rooting him several times. He kept resisting and the cleric was OOM (oops,
> I
> used an acronym). We had to run to the border again. We recharged and
> tracked him down once again. The second time, the cleric just kept
> smiting
> him and we eventually killed him. All told did over 800 damage to him.
> He
> didn't drop any loot which was a disappointment. When we killed him, the
> factions affected, which all got worse, were The Dead, King and Queen of
> some wierd name, Keepers of the Art, and Eldritch Collective. After the
> fight, we asked around if anyone had ever seen/heard of this NPC before.
> No
> one in the zone had heard of him. Was wondering if anyone on this list
> could shed some light on his background? Also wanted to warn everyone in
> case they ran into him and they were less level 30 they should be prepared
> to run.
>
> BTW, by the way he was acting, almost 100% certain it wasn't a GM
> controlled
> NPC.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
> CPT Tom Reece
> G4 Maintenance Officer
> 655-4978
